definition: grandfather's sister/sister of a woman's father-in-law
paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: I've been worried since I first met you that you might end up being a spinster.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次见到你时曾经担心过你会不会变成个老姑婆。

sentences.english: Grandpa, do you really call her grandma?
sentences.chinese: 老爷爷，您真的叫她姑婆？

sentences.english: You know, they call him 'the baby eater'?
sentences.chinese: 你知道有人家叫他虎姑婆吗？

sentences.english: Mr Wopsle's great-aunt kept an evening school in the village;
sentences.chinese: 沃甫赛先生的姑婆在村子里创办了一所夜校。

sentences.english: I smell like my Great Aunt Tessie .
sentences.chinese: 我闻上去也像我的黛西姑婆。

sentences.english: She is elegant, beautiful , clever, so her aunt likes her very much.
sentences.chinese: 优雅美丽，乖巧伶俐，因而深得马奇姑婆的喜爱。

sentences.english: Aunt Maud did not like my clothes and she said so, roundly.
sentences.chinese: 莫德姑婆很正经地说她不喜欢我穿的衣服。

definition: great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
aunt by marriage/husband's aunt/husband's father's younger brother's wife
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
father's female cousin via female line
